 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
AzureBlade was unimpressed. Instinctively, he reached
through his 
spark and into the Matrix to speak directly with
Shadimus.

AzureBlade: You would kill me simply for who I am? For
me being a 
Predacon? Check for yourself; I commited no crime.

He transforms to Dragon mode, stretching his wing as
if preparing to 
leave.

AzureBlade: And by the way, Unicron's coming will need
every single 
warrior we can muster on this rock. This is partly why
I killed no 
one in there. Now, let me leave.

Shadowcaster studied Azure for a minute- noticing how
far his madness had gone.

Shadowcaster: I have no intention of killing you- just
as I have no intention of letting you leave without
dealing with this. The question is, are you fully
aware of what you're choosing.

At this he reaches through his spark, and into the
matrix, sending the vivid memories of his decent into
madness when his original Quintesson programming had
taken over and he used maximal and predacon alike in
an obsessive attempt at bloodlusting revenge on
Megatron II.

Shadowcaster: Is that what you want? To defile every
nobile act you have ever committed? Not that it
matters anyway- go get to the Pred base, you have to
go through me first.

Shadowcaster primed himself for combat, raising his
alertness to high.
